description: Get ready to GUIDE THE GHOST! In this exciting game, you must help your friendly yellow ghost get through all the obstacles. Be careful, hit a wall and it's game over! Endless fun for the whole family.
name: GUIDE THE GHOST
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
